topic: How to deploy web backends using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to deploy web backends using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Deploying Web Backends Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide provides a comprehensive walkthrough on how to create and deploy a web backend application using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+.
version_notes: Python 3.12+ is required for FastAPI to function.
Uvicorn ASGI server (used for development) requires Python 3.7+.
caveats: Ensure you have all necessary dependencies installed before proceeding.
When deploying to production, use a suitable web server such as Gunicorn or uWSGI for better performance and scalability.
